name: Alfonzo SALLEY, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS PHILADELPHIA; and its President Judge Paula Dembe Prior, Respondents
name_abbreviation: Salley v. Court of Common Pleas

parties: Alfonzo SALLEY, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS PHILADELPHIA; and its President Judge Paula Dembe Prior, Respondents.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 24th day of July, 2014, Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, and the Petition for Writ of Mandamus is DENIED. The Prothonotary is directed to strike the name of the jurist from the caption.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
96 A.3d 1023
Alfonzo SALLEY, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS PHILADELPHIA; and its President Judge Paula Dembe Prior, Respondents.
No. 66 EM 2014.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
July 24, 2014.
